Game.Name: Magical Quest 3 Starring Mickey & Donald (USA) (En,Fr,De)
Game.plot: Overview:Disney's Magical Quest 3 starring Mickey Mouse and Donald Duck is third and final adventure in the Magic Quest series, the game was release in Japan on December 8 1995 for the Super Famicom and was not available outside of Japan until its re-release for the Game Boy Advance in June 14 2005 for North America and June 17 2005 for Europe.Gameplay:The game features a mix of platforming and action adventure and like its predecessors the player is aided by different power ups in the form clothing, one of the changes from The Great Circus Mystery Starring Mickey and Minnie Mouse is this time the cloths work differently for each character insted of just being an aesthetic change, for example the knight cloth gives Mickey a lance with a globe that can attack in different directions and a shield, but the armor its to heavy and will sink in water while Donald get a Hammer that attacks in an arc and a Barrel armor that lets him hide inside or roll over, the Barrel armor also floats in water.
Game.Developer: Capcom Co., Ltd., Capcom Entertainment, Inc.
